00020 #include "ObjectModelOrientedLine.h"
00021 
00022 namespace brics_3d {
00023 
00024 void
00025   ObjectModelOrientedLine::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00026                   double threshold, std::vector<int> &inliers)
00027 {
00028   // Obtain the line direction
00029   Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4],
00030                   model_coefficients[5], 0);
00031 
00032   // Check against template, if given
00033   if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00034   {
00035     double angleDifference = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, line_dir));
00036     angleDifference = fmin (angleDifference, M_PI - angleDifference);
00037     // Check whether the current plane model satisfies our angle threshold
00038     //criterion with respect to the given axis
00039     if (angleDifference > epsAngle)
00040     {
00041       inliers.resize (0);
00042       return;
00043     }
00044   }
00045 
00046   this->selectWithinDistance (model_coefficients, threshold, inliers);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void
00050    ObjectModelOrientedLine::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00051                    std::vector<double> &distances)
00052  {
00053    // Obtain the line direction
00054    Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4],
00055                    model_coefficients[5], 0);
00056 
00057    // Check against template, if given
00058    if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00059    {
00060      double angleDifference = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, line_dir));
00061      angleDifference = fmin (angleDifference, M_PI - angleDifference);
00062      // Check whether the current plane model satisfies our angle threshold
00063      //criterion with respect to the given axis
00064      if (angleDifference > epsAngle)
00065      {
00066        distances.resize (0);
00067        return;
00068      }
00069    }
00070 
00071    this->getDistancesToModel (model_coefficients, distances);
00072  }
